description: The default landing page for the search in the form of <moduleId>, <controller>, <action>. The application's home page will redirect here.    The module must be avilable and active, otherwise another redirect happens to the home page, which causes a loop.     The designated action must be set to public in the feature permission mgmt, otherwise the request will be redirected to the login page.     The 'type' attribute must be compatible with the System.TypeCode case-sensitive.

entries.description: The application name is used in several places in the system. e.g. as title in the email
user is not logging in -> app goes to
user logged in, but do not have permission to view the page; shell, home, nopermission is by default; Alternatives must be in a module NOT shell
landing page for users , when they logged in successfuly
landing page for users , when they logged in successfuly
All administrative information will be sent to this email.
If this flag is set to true, all exceptions will be forwarded to SystemEmail.
This flag truns on/off the Multimedia Module.

Example: PartyType1:PartyRelationshipTypeTitle1-PartyRelationshipTypeTitle2,PartyType2,PartyType3:PartyRelationshipTypeTitle1. Define the allow party type for account registeration and their relationship type. each party type could have zero or multi allowed relationship( they should be available in the database). if the relationship type has one 'partytypepair' -> load the allowed target of this 'partytypepair'         if  the relationship type has more than one 'partytypepair' -> load the allowed target of the 'partytypepair' which has 'partyrelationshiptypedefault==true'
